dialogue.text: I wake up to nothing at all.
A horrible start to the day.
I faintly recall getting up in the middle of the night to blast the AC, but it has now reached a point where I am so cold that I don’t even want to move.
So I lie here and die.
I lie here underneath a beige ceiling, accompanied by the four paperthin walls propping it up-
And die.
Goodbye, world.
I stare up and try to connect this morning’s vision with the one I’m most accompanied with.
This ceiling is lower than the one in my room, which means that if I were to continue growing, I’d hit my head on this one before the other.
But that’s just how verticality works.
The higher something is, the safer it is.
So we should all ascend and ascend and ascend, placing ourselves on top of the highest things we can find.
Because only then can we look down at those who have had their growth stunted and laugh a hearty laugh, pressing our hands against the skin of our arms to scare away the goosebumps.
I have never liked the way the world looks right after opening my eyes.
It’s one of the saddest views of all.
Because even though it is wonderful to breathe and wonderful to see-
It is not wonderful to be.
But I am.
Oh, you’re up.
Yo.
Io.
What are you doing here?
Avoiding female contact.
Yes, but...when did you even get here? I went to sleep pretty late.
Sometime between like, 2:00 AM and 3:00 AM I think?
Uh-huh. And how exactly did you get into my room?
I told the people at the front desk that you were my dad and they just gave me a key.
Crafty, right?
I’m glad you didn’t have the chain lock attached because that would have meant I’d need to go home and get my tools, which would be significantly harder to explain to the employees.
You were that desperate to get away from your floormates, huh?
Don’t tell me you’re surprised by that.
I’m not. But I {i}am{/i} surprised that you didn’t just go back to the dorm instead.
To tell you the truth, so am I.
But it was somewhere around like 1:30 that I started thinking about stuff, and among all of those thoughts was this one guy who looks kind of like you.
Kind of?
Kind of. You look pretty different without your glasses.
And you look different in...whatever you’re wearing right now.
What’s wrong with what I’m wearing right now?
It's...
Nothing. It's fine.
If you close your eyes, I can put my normal clothes back on. I got changed while you were sleeping and just threw them all at the foot of your bed.
At least have the courtesy to wake me up next time.
You did wake up. You stepped on my leg on your way to the air conditioner before deciding that you wanted to freeze the two of us to death.
I’m sure I was only subconsciously trying to freeze myself to death. I didn’t realize you were here.
And literally stepping on me wasn’t enough to give that away?
I...was apparently very tired.
Well, since you’re awake now, how about we start drafting our escape plan?
Escape plan?
Yeah. Where we ditch the rest of this competition thing and go hang out at an amusement park or something.
I don’t think I’m allowed to do that, unfortunately.
What do you mean you’re not allowed? You’re a grown man and you make your own rules.
What do you have to gain by letting a bunch of annoying [teens] drag you around like you’re some kind of dog all day?
What do I have to gain by ditching them to be with you?
One whole Io. Redeemable wherever Ios are accepted.
So basically nowhere because Io is trash and her value keeps getting lower and lower with each passing day.
Yeah, that doesn’t sound like a great investment.
What if I add like...a snack to the deal? You like potato chips?
Let’s go get potato chips. And soda. And then ride some big fucking rollercoaster or something.
You have too much energy for it being this early...
In fact, why are you even awake? Didn’t you say you didn’t fall asleep until like 2:00 or 3:00?
Ish. But it’s not really easy to sleep when A: you stepped on me and really hurt my leg. And B: I had to sleep on the floor.
Like, yeah, I’ve got a futon and stuff...
But that bed looks crazy comfortable and it gave me one of those inner struggle things where I had to think about whether or not it would be cool to join you in there.
I wouldn’t have minded. Though, it definitely would have been a little more confusing to wake up to that when I feel like I haven’t seen much of you at all lately.
And whose fault is that?
You realize that you’re one of the two people I actually enjoy spending time with, right?
And Uta’s been kind of all over me lately, so it would be nice if you’d come see me more to balance out the scale and blah blah blah Io is needy.
Speaking of Uta, did you ever tell her where you ran off to? I know she was looking for you last night.
In fact, where {i}did{/i} you run off to?
I think some of Ayane’s blood splashed onto me after she was decimated at the maid cafe, so I wound up going back to my aunt’s to take a bath.
Also figured that Yuki might be there since it was a Saturday night and she’s normally free around then. But nope, no dice.
Probably because she was with me.
Yuki was?
Yeah, I ran into her while I was walking around.
Oh, okay. So you two didn’t like, make plans or anything. You just bumped into each other.
How do you find the time to cultivate relationships with so many people, Sensei?
Easy. Time is unlimited.
That’s debatable.
Time is a human construct with no direct intrinsic value, so it’s only as unlimited as we humans want or imagine it to be.
Also, the fact that time itself could be considered unlimited has no bearing on the time that you, a middle aged male, have left to live your life.
Cherish every second. Celebrate what it means to live. Vote Io.
...Vote Io for what?
Dunno. Just sounded like a good campaign slogan.
Anyway, is it cool if I use your shower to get ready for the amusement park? I don’t really wear makeup so I’ll only be like ten minutes tops.
Io, I’m not going to the amusement park with you. I have to get up and...let girls fight over me or something.
But I’m fighting for you right now. Why does anyone else need to be involved?
Because they made plans to fight for me and didn’t just sneak into my room in the middle of the night.
Guh. Who would have thought that being assertive would spell my downfall when it only seems to make you like everyone else more?
It’s not a downfall and I don’t like you any less than I did before. I just can’t do what you want me to do right now.
But you know what you {i}can{/i} do?
Please please please please please please {i}please{/i} do not ask me to join in on any of the weird “festivities” our class has planned for today.
It sucks enough that I’m already showing up for like half of them.
Expecting me to join in and talk to people on top of that is just like...yeah, no.
Like, I said maybe two sentences to that Chika girl during the sports thing yesterday and even that was more associating than I planned on doing the whole weekend.
Why not Yumi, then?
Oh, right. You weren’t there for it when we were choosing the competitions, but I’m pretty sure Yumi wants to fight me.
What? Why?
Probably because I’m like half her size and she has anger issues that likely stem from repeated emotional abuse at a [young]age.
Why do you have to be so real all the time?
Real? I’m more fake than like, all of the people I call out for {i}being{/i} fake on a daily basis.
It’s a very complicated situation, but I’d be more than happy to explain it to you on a rollercoaster.
Io...
Hah...Yeah, yeah. I know.
There won’t {i}be{/i} a rollercoaster because I was too spontaneous for you and didn’t fill out the proper “Sensei request” forms.
I’ll just take my broken leg and hobble on over to the ER all by myself. Maybe someone there will want to ride the teacups with me.
If that’s not housekeeping, this is going to be really hard to explain.
Sensei? Are you awake yet?
That doesn’t sound like housekeeping.
I hop off of the bed, making sure I don’t step on Io again, and gesture at her to get up as well...
Ugh...
I’m going to have to hide, aren’t I?
Would you prefer to stay and chat with her about why you’re in my room?
Sure. Why not? Invite her on in and I’ll tell her all about why I prefer being with you over like 99.99%% of the world.
Or alternatively, you could grab your clothes off of the floor and go...hide under a desk or something.
Hey...is everything okay? Do I hear someone else in there?
What about the futon? I don’t have time to get rid of both.
Just...
Here, I’ll help.
I put on my glasses and grab the futon off the floor.
Io scurries over to where she threw her clothes, following my lead and tossing everything into the bathroom at the same time as me.
I’m sorry, Io. It must be done.
What must be-
Hey! Sensei! I would have...gone in on my own!
I throw Io into the bathroom as well and finally move to the door to let Chika in.
Good morning~
Good morning. What are you doing here?
I just came to say that since we didn’t really get to talk at all yesterday.
What took so long to get to the door? I didn’t wake you up, did I?
You did, actually. But it’s okay.
You should probably get going before someone else has the same idea as you and-
Joke’s on you. I set an alarm extra early just so I could be the one who actually got to come wake you.
And sure, the rest of the girls will be waking up soon-
Chika, stop it. I haven't even brushed my teeth yet. I am not ready to hug.
This wouldn't be such an issue if you didn't always smile while hugging.
I can not help it. The hugs just make me so happy.
Besides, don't you have to get ready for your contest or whatever?
If you are not well prepared, you may regret it in the future.
Ughhhhhhh yeah, I guess you're right.
Wait, what even is your contest anyway?
I can't tell you since it's supposed to be a surprise...
But let’s just say that being your girlfriend gives me a preeeeeetty big advantage in it.
And of course she has to say that while Io is just one paperthin wall away. Great.
Anyway, good morning and I love you. Try not to miss me too much before my contest, okay?
Or do. In fact, you probably should, since I’ll be missing {i}you{/i} a whole lot.
Yeah...
I’ll see you later, Chika.
Mhm~ See you later, Sensei.
I love you.
Io comes out of the bathroom a full minute after Chika leaves, but doesn’t say anything once she does.
I guess it’s not really easy finding words at a time like this, though.
Or ever, really.
So I just let her stand there for a little while longer.
And I stand there with her.
Not saying anything, and barely thinking anything other than “Fuck. This sucks.” which, in my defense, it does.
It sucks for everyone involved.
Woe is me, having so many girls who like me as much as they do.
Or, in some cases-
...Girlfriend?
In some cases, love.
It’s...a really complicated misunderstanding.
Of course it is. Girls are the fucking worst.
Just tell her you’re not dating if it’s becoming too much of a problem.
It’s a little more complicated than that...
Well...tell me about it, then.
I don’t really think it’s something you should be getting involved in.
And it’s not something I particularly {i}want{/i} to be involved in...but it beats the hell out of everything I’m going to be thinking for the rest of the day now.
Io-
{i}Her?{/i}
{i}That{/i} was your choice?
A generic tanned, bleach blonde gyaru?
Chika’s not generic, she’s-
She’s been gone for like five minutes and I can still smell her fucking perfume.
What the hell, Sensei? You're so much better than that.
Is that really the kind of girl you’re into? Is it because she, like...put out right away or something?
It’s not that. I just-
Is it just blondes in general? Is that your thing? Because there was that other girl who you already-
Io, correct me if I’m wrong, but haven’t you said before that who I “see” is none of your business?
It’s {i}not{/i} any of my business! You can do whatever you want and I don’t have the right to get upset over it!
But...
But I’m apparently going to get upset over it anyway!
Why?
Because I’m sensitive! And a hypocrite! You know these things!
I do. Which is why I’m not holding this against you and lecturing you the way I did when you talked down on Ayane without getting to know her.
Sensei, I don’t know what kind of person you want me to be...but I don’t want to get to know these people.
Then don’t. No one is forcing you to.
Do you...
Can we go to the amusement park now?
Io-
I didn’t think so.
It's really funny, you know.
I told myself when I left the bathroom that I’d just pretend I didn’t hear anything and that nothing ever happened-
But of course I decided to be {i}me{/i} again and just started venting without even thinking about how it would make you feel.
I’m sure you have your reasons for whatever you’re doing with that girl.
And I’m sure you have your reasons for the way you’re reacting to it.
And I’m sure that I’ll wind up telling you all about them at the worst or most inappropriate time one of these days.
And I’m sure that I’ll be right there to listen.
And I’m sure that you’ll hate me for it.
And I’m sure that I won’t.
I think I’m going to...skip taking a shower this morning since I took a bath like, less than twelve hours ago.
You can...go on ahead, though. If you need to meet up with everyone, I mean.
If it’s okay with you, I’d...like to try sleeping for a little while longer in here since I didn’t get much last night.
Do you need me to carry you to the bed? I’m not sure how broken your leg is.
Not so broken that I need you to carry me. I’ll be okay.
Then yeah. Feel free to spend as much time in here as you want.
Just don’t answer the door for anyone.
Not even housekeeping?
Not even housekeeping.
And...uhh...I’m sorry.
For snapping again, I mean.
I don’t want you to hate me just because I found out something I probably wasn’t supposed to know.
It was bound to happen sooner or later. But it’s really not as serious as she made it sound and-
I’m sorry if this is blunt, but I really don’t care.
Which means I really don’t want to hear anymore about it.
Which means I should probably stop talking.
We both should. We’re not very good at it.
No, we’re really not.
I...guess this is the part where you leave, then?
Well, yes. But there is one glaring issue.
Is it that you’re still wearing sweatpants?
It is that I’m still wearing sweatpants.
Can I at least see your secret abdomen eye again before I go?
I begin to lift up my shirt and-
That was a joke, Sensei!
I mean, I {i}have{/i} seen it. But only through the camera! And...I’ll just go back into the bathroom and...wait or something.
Oh. Sure. Whatever is more comfortable for you.
Thanks...but can you...open the door maybe?
Of course. But only because the eye told me to.
Io opens her eyes and quickly reaches for the handle of the bathroom door, throwing herself inside without so much as looking at me.
I use this opportunity to have a telepathic conversation with my secret eye and perform my morning sacrifice of a goldfish in order to appease him.
It gets tiring having to carry around so many goldfish all the time-
But if that is what the eyes wants-
I must obey.
